short_summary: Barge Disposal Using Ship Breaking in Lincoln, Ontario
description: Disposal of a 100 ft commercial steel barge located at the Jordan Harbour in Lincoln, Ontario. The Contractor will prepare the vessel for transfer, transfer to an approved site and subsequently dismantle and dispose or recycle the vessel in an environmentally responsible manner. The contract is expected to be completed by September 15, 2023, with Indigenous Benefits requested for this project. The Bidder shall ensure removal of the vessel from its current location by August 15, 2023 and complete the work by September 15, 2023.
full_summary:
**Request for Proposal: Disposal of Barge**
=============================================

**Tender Details**
-----------------

*   **Reference Number**: WS3888916848-Doc3892891746
*   **Solicitation Number**: WS3888916848
*   **Publication Date**: 2023-03-02
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-04-20 14:00:00 EST

**Project Overview**
-------------------

The Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) invites proposals from qualified contractors to dispose of a commercial steel barge located at Jordan Harbour in Lincoln, Ontario. 

**Project Requirements**
------------------------

*   Preparation of the vessel for transfer to an approved site
*   Transfer of the vessel to the approved site
*   Efficient and environmentally responsible breakdown of the vessel using ship breaking techniques

**Proposal Submission and Evaluation**
--------------------------------------

Proposals must be submitted in accordance with the instructions provided on the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and CanadaBuys posting closing time. The evaluation process will be based on lowest price, and all bids submitted after the specified closing time will be considered non-responsive.

**Supporting Documentation**
---------------------------

The following documents must be included with the proposal:

*   Indigenous Benefits Plan (IBP)

**Contract Details**
---------------------

*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2023-05-05
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: 2023-09-15
*   **Regions of Delivery**: Canada
*   **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **End-User Entity**: Canadian Coast Guard (CCG)

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For more information, please contact Major, Andrea (SPAC/PSPC) at andrea.major@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Important Notes**
------------------

*   Amendments to original contract requirements may be made at any time.
*   Proposals submitted after the specified closing time will be declared non-responsive. 

Dispositions:
Competition ID: WS3888916848
Classification: Marine Engineering
Trade Agreement: Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
